Class constructor

Instance Method Details

# (void) start(eventName, categoryName)

Start a new event chronometer

Parameters:

  • eventName ( String ) — The event name to start
  • categoryName ( String ) — The category name (optional)

# (Event) stop(eventName)

Stop an event chronometer

Parameters:

  • eventName ( String ) — The event name to stop

Returns:

  • ( Event ) — The event finished

# (Event) getEvent(eventName)

Get an event chronometer

Parameters:

  • eventName ( String ) — The event name to get

Returns:

  • ( Event ) — The event or null if not found

# (void) lap(eventName)

Register a new lap in an event chronometer

Parameters:

  • eventName ( String ) — The event concerned by the lap
